longBusinessSummary: Kellton Tech Solutions Limited provides digital transformation, ERP, and other IT services in Asia Pacific, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers digital business solutions, including artificial intelligence and machine learning, data engineering and science, product strategy and consulting, product design and management, cloud consulting and migration, cloud managed, DevSecOps, digital application development, mobile engineering, IoT and wearable, quality engineering, blockchain, Web3.0, metaverse, and SAP solutions. It also provides Audit.io, a digital solution to manage retail store and warehouse operations; Tasks.io, an automated task management system; Kellton4Commerce, an e-commerce solution for targeted customer experiences and partner/seller network management; Optima, an IoT-enabled digital oilfield analytics platform; Kellton4Health which embraces the digital fitness revolution; KLGAME, a location-based gamification, analytics, and messaging engine platform; Kellton4NFT, a platform that provides tools for artists, musicians, and other creators; and tHRive, a HCM solution that offers employee workflows, real-time staff tracking, performance governance, and workforce analytic services. It serves fintech, banking and financial services, insurance, non-profit, government, education, manufacturing, automation, chemicals, retail and e-commerce, distribution, travel, logistics, hospitality, oil and gas mining, pharma, healthcare, life science, and energy and utilities sectors, as well as HiTech, SaaS, ISV, and communication sectors. Kellton Tech Solutions Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
